description:
What is low-profile, can carry up to 50kg across the country, and weighs the same as 10.4 Clif Bars? The Streamliner Disc DLX Pannier rack is Ready for grocery shopping, touring to Patagonia, and everything in between. The mounting system allows for the rack to be attached to your bike frame's eyelets, or directly to the wheel's quick-release axle. The mounting hardware pushes the rack further back to improve heel clearance and create more room for disc brake calipers.

  • Made of 6061-T6 aluminum with double hand-welds for strength and durability
  • Narrow profile helps keep it out of the wind and improves stability when panniers are loaded
  • Mounting method makes this rack compatible with disc brake–equipped bikes
  • Versalock arms ensures a wide variety of mounting options for the stabilisation bars
  • Load capacity of 50kg is more than you'll want to carry up any hill
  • Compatible with the following wheel sizes: 26in.,27in.,28in.,700c
name: Axiom Streamliner Disc DLX Pannier Rack
